content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were traveling at night (~2130 hrs) on a rural country highway in godwin, sampson county, nc, when we observed three bright white lights, in the general shape of a triangle, enter our field of vision. we stopped at a crossroads as this happened and continued to observe. it became apparent this object was definitely a dark triangular object, about the size of a nickel from our vantage point, with three bright white lights - one at each vertex - with a ring of flashing, multi-colored lights on its underside. we rolled down the windows and found the object was noiseless, at least from our location. we approximated our distance from the object to be roughly one to five miles judging by its size and speed against the night sky. it moved at a relatively modest and consistent rate of speed from the south-southeast in a generally northerly direction until it disappeared from our view due to the tree line. the event lasted approximately one to two minutes. we also noted there was a strong electrical storm further southwest in the fayetteville, nc, area.
content.summary: A triangular ufo with 3 white light points and a circle of bright flashing colors on belly

content.detailedDescription: Me my brother and mother took a vacation to arizona near flagstaff and we had a house on top of a rock in a more rocky hilly area and it was around 11 o'clock at night and me and my mother were tired and went out stargazing and all of the sudden a circular ovally object flew over head but looked like it was probably in the stratoaphere and high up and it sat there for around 5-10 seconds flashing beams of multi colored beams of lights that were blue and purple and we noticed it and i was very scared and then it made a real big flash of these colors and beamed away out of sight.
content.summary: Flew above flashed multiple lights beamed away fast

content.detailedDescription: I have sighted many saucers from a distance for yrs but this one hovered by inland road and the other just to the left of the moon . am willing to use polygraph and truth serum plus i have worked with extraterrestrials, the government,and the mafia. i witnessed the recent ones alone but my friend witnessed something strange with me as well once.Anyhow text me or come to me i checked myself into the university oiowa psyche ward to try to have my claims evaluated properly so far not happening though. sadly my phone got hacked shortly before the first close sighting and the second one it just moved out of view too quickly.
content.summary: Strange silent telepathic saucer and later on a telepathic cube with one large red light on it's left side

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my porch observing an oncoming storm facing north. i noticed what appeared to be two rings of bright red/orange lights. each ring was made up of six to eight lights. they were hovering just above the horizon over happy valley, arizona in cochise county. i was approximately ten to fifteen miles from the objects. they hovered for approximately five seconds, one ring slightly northwest of the other. they then appeared to vanish, no movement or flash of light or light trail. there appeared to be a slight haze or warping of light within the rings. when first noticed i thought they were possibly helicopters or balloons. the lights did not flash so i excluded helicopters, and when they simply vanished, i ruled out balloons. i also thought they may have been fireworks, but hey didn't explode, they simply hovered with a steady red/orange light, and then vanished. i was excited to see the object and remained watching the area of the object for two to three minutes after its disappearance.
content.summary: Two circlularsets of bright hovering lights just above horizon that vanished after a few seconds

content.detailedDescription: Taken photos of what was coming out of my t.V. screen, a spark of white light,a pitcher frame from the movie.Look at the photo i took about 600 of them, ........Change in pitch of sound then a eletric filling........The next frame showed up.
content.summary: Came out of my t.V.

content.detailedDescription: Zeman eat humans...
content.summary: I see zeman !

content.detailedDescription: The last few years i have been bothered by barometric pressure changes in weather that give me headaches, even when i am in a dead sleep, they'll wake me up. last monday morning at 2:40am it was no exception waking up because the weather outside was changing along with being really noisy. i sat up on the edge of my bed for a minute with a pounding headache thinking about going to the kitchen to get an excedrin migraine pill. as i sat there looking out of my bedroom window before getting up, i noticed how weird and alive the sky was above as i looked out seeing continuous, and i mean continuous lightening flashes and thunder within one cloud above as i was watching. i was mesmerized by how it seemed to continue with the same intensity, one lightening flash after another, for almost 10 minutes without the cloud moving in any direction. the lightening never ceased or slowed which i thought was weird considering all the thunder storms i have seen all my life. i have never seen intensity as that was ever. i was about to get up when i noticed some flashes of lightening that appeared to be in front of and behind the corner of a triangle silhouette with in the cloud. it was very brief, maybe for 3 to 4 seconds, but the edge of what i saw was very hard and solidly defined about half ways into the object with the rest just fading into the cloud. i had no way to judge how high or big it was considering the continuing of the lightening flashes--maybe 5000 feet up--i don't know...  startled by what i saw i forgot about getting a pill for my pounding head but got up and went out onto my deck. i stood and watched the same cloud for the next half hour. it wasn't raining but there was a ton of energy in the night air. i thought about getting my camera but didn't think i could capture what was going on with the continuous lightening strikes in the cloud and maybe over exposing the picture. the only time i ever saw the silhouette image was when i was sitting on the edge of my bed looking thru the bedroom window. there is nothing inside the bedroom or even outside that would have given me this as being a false illusion. i considered that all the next day and saw nothing obvious that would twist or reflect what i saw thru the window earlier that morning. i thought about waking my wife so she could see this weird one cloud lightening within itself, but didn't realizing she had to get up in 2 hours to go to work. what was more weird after the half hour i stood on my deck watching this cloud, the lightening totally stopped and the cloud remained motionless with other clouds in the moon lit sky, like someone turned off a power switch.... after that i went back to bed not realizing my headache was gone till the next morning. i could draw a sketch of what i saw if needed.
content.summary: Large defined silhouette corner of triangle shape in thunder cloud seen because of lightening in front of and behind

content.detailedDescription:
Iõd like to document a sighting last night that i believe is highly unusual. iõd be curious to know if anyone else has written in to you about this as well, confirming the highly strange characteristics of this sighting. 

below are 3 pictures attached to better illustrate the sighting:

1. google maps image of the rooftop location where my friend and i were sitting, in yorkville area of toronto, very much in the center of the city, corner of avenue rd and davenport, facing the east initially, where we first noticed the unidentified aerial phenomenon. 
2. iphone 5s image of the direction the uap was first noticed. unfortunately, i did not have my phone with me at the initial moment of the sighting but went down to get it. once i returned it had already disappeared into an easterly direction, the same from where we first noticed it. 
3. image of an airplane passing overhead as a contrast-reference point. i am facing west in this photo and the plane is flying east. one can clearly see, even on the wide-angle lens of the iphone 5s, the flashing lights of the plane as well as the planeõs outline. i want to contrast the flashing red light brightness, color, and size of the planeõs lights to the lights we witnessed. 

1.
2. 
3.
 
at approximately 10:15pm sunday evening, july 26th my friend and i came up to my rooftop to have desert and watch the sky. as i sat down at the table placing the fruit bowl down, my friend was looking east and brought to my attention an unusually bright, red light. flying from the eastern sky from my rooftop in a northerly direction were 2 objects with very large red lights. what was different about these two objects were the lights, initially. there was only one color and one light on the flying object unlike the airplanes passing overhead, which at that time the sky was very busy with air traffic compared to most evenings.  

the red light was a much deeper, denser, fuller red than the airplanes passing by. it did not have a flash-like quality as iõd normally describe the airplane light flashing on and off, but was more like a slower turn-on, turn off characteristic to it, like a fade-up and down, rather than an abrupt flash on and off. 

at the distance from me the larger size red light was bigger than the largest star (jupiter), perhaps 4 to 6 times bigger than the plane lights overhead. the smaller red light was around the size of a planeõs flashing light but at that distance i would guess it is larger, but only slightly. i could not determine if it was attached to a solid object or if it was just light. my guess was that it may be attached to something but i could not see it at night, though the airplanes above the city can be seen unless they are extremely high. i also should comment that there was a lot of energy in the air, as if there was a lot going on energetically in the city at that time whereas when the lights disappeared into the eastern sky, the buzz and activity overhead quieted down to a normal sunday night feeling for 10:30pm. 

as seen in photo 3, i took a shot of a passing plane with red light flashing on its left wing. iõd describe this as a flash on and flash off, and very bright. bright because it seems like a white light beneath a red casing, like on a police car. the red of the 2 unknown lights didnõt have that quality. they were a much deeper, saturated red without white in the brightness of it. the plane in the photo overhead is low enough to see its wings as well, as it flies in an easterly direction over my rooftop, ascending as it flies east. my guess is that this plane is 2000 feet high.

by contrast, the uap was first noticed in the eastern sky flying north. there were two of them. one was either smaller, just in front of the larger red light, or it was moving parallel to the larger red light but farther away in the distance, thus appearing smaller. the small red light on the first craft, which initially made me think it was a lot farther away, had a red light slightly larger than the one on the plane flying over my rooftop even though iõd guess it was flying 5000 feet high and many kilometers away. the larger red light, which flew slightly behind the first one, was perhaps the size of the 4 or more lights on the plane. maybe four or more lights together in size if we use the plane as a cross reference. the red color was slightly deeper, darker in color to the red arrow i have drawn on the photo. it was a red that was rich, deep, and somehow different to light on a plane, which always seem to have white as the base, no matter if red, blue, or green. no other flashing or pulsing color was visible, like on an airplane. one light, deep red, and with a slow on and off quality, not like the flashing quality of the airplanes. there were also a few moments where the on-off quality of the red light was irregular, as if disappearing altogether and then appearing on the same path in the sky but farther ahead. in the darkness of the evening and the distance from where i observed the lights, i could not determine if the lights were attached to a solid craft or not. 

as the two objects flew north, it looked like the smaller one continued north and the larger one turned left sharply towards the west. the curve in my arrow in picture 2 is close to where the object banked a strong left turn. the smaller red light in front seemed to continue north for a few seconds but it then disappeared from our vision. as the larger red light made its sharp turn, it sort of did a zig-zag move, or an òsó shape turn before continuing north of the city but in a westerly direction. also within seconds of that òsó shaped turn, i noticed a very bright white-blue flash in the sky in the north, not much more than 1/2 inch distance in the sky from the red light. it resembled a jet coming in for a landing with bright headlight on, but additionally, this bright flash seemed to me to be larger in an up/down size than wide, resembling a slit of some sort but it was extremely fast in its flash with no lingering quality. 

as the larger red light continued towards the west in the sky north of the city approximately under the big dipper now, we noticed that the little red light was there again, just slightly in front. we commented on how it could have reached and caught up to the large red light since they seemed to veer off in different directions at the point in photo 2 where the large red light made its turn from the northeast towards the west. the little red light just appeared. this time it was moving ever so slightly in front of the larger red light as they were now heading south but in the western sky from my rooftop vantage point, which for people from toronto would be in the direction of the international airport now. they were moving at a speed faster than the jets flying overhead, perhaps twice the speed as the jets were coming in and taking off from pearson international airport to the west of the city from my location. 

as the 2 red lights continued south they again banked left or towards the east, as if doing a large circle around the city perimeter. as we looked to the south sky as the small and large red lights made their way east, the angle or distance between the 2 red lights gave the appearance as if they were almost touching, with no space between them. at that point i ran downstairs for my iphone but when i came back up, they disappeared into the eastern sky where we first noticed them. i looked at my watch and it was 10:27pm. perhaps 5 to 7 minutes later than when we first saw them. 

i go up to my rooftop almost every evening to observe the sky, sometimes with my star chart to see where the different planets are or even the satellites passing overhead, which i have photographed on my iphone. in all the years i have been living here and observing the plane routes and stars overhead, i have never seen red lights of that kind on a craft before, ever. thus this report and the curiosity to know if other sightings from toronto were reported about 2 deep red lights circling the city from a 5 to 10 km radius of the center of the city where i was located. 

assuming toronto is roughly 25 miles in diameter the distance traveled would be a circle of the city = 157 miles.
if 15 min. it would be 628 miles per hour.  
if 10 min it would be 924 mph., which would have given off a sonic boom if it was a conventional aircraft.
as it was closer to a 5 ð 7 minute sighting, that would make it between 1386 and 1617mph. i donõt believe it was that fast. perhaps the circle circumference was a tighter diameter.

assuming a tighter diameter (20 miles) for the circle circumference = 125 miles a 15 min trip = 500 mph  
10 min = 750 mph which is right around the speed of sound but still under.
at 6 min and 20 mile diameter speed = 1250 mph
i guessed the speed to be twice or more times the speed of the jets flying in all directions overhead. that said, judging distances at night by a light alone is a challenge. it could well have been much closer, like a 3 to 5 miles. very difficult to determine.
content.summary: Two red lights, one much larger than a plane following closely to a smaller red light, slightly larger than a plane circle toronto before disappearing in the east.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were driving back from mission, on #1 hwy at langley and approx 232 ave, west bound and we both saw a large black rectangular object with 4 to 5 round exhaust ports that slowly changed colors. it was laying flat like a monolith. it paced the traffic going west and accelerated at a 45 degree angle and took off into the sky. going ssw. the sun  was setting off to the right and was about 10 degrees off our starboard side of the car. people saw it while driving and we were all pointing at it until it flew away. pretty darn cool stuff!!
content.summary: Rectangular  black with 4-5 round multicolored "ports"  in aft end

content.detailedDescription: Basketball size yellow orange surface not a light in the south
content.summary: Saw in south looked in to car  looked back and it was gone

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter and i went for a hike in sedona, arizona thursday july 23rd, 2015, came home to look at the pictures and saw that i had captured a pleiadian beamship/vehicle in one of the images:)

these vehicles must move in and out of dimensions because i did not see it during that day and i'm always watching the skies for et/ufo activity.

there was no sound and i think it was invisible to my human eyes, not sure, beacause i remember looking in that direction often...

i have many past experiences with et's and ufo's, i'm a ground crew member:)

i enjoy communicating with our cosmic brothers and sisters and i wish i would have noticed this vehicle as i would have asked for a landing because nobody else was around...

also my grandfather is vince uhlenkott of mufon

this image was taken from an iphone 6.

if anyone would like the original image for study i can email to you.
content.summary: Ufo - sedona, arizona 7-23-2015

content.detailedDescription:
at about 4:45-4:50 am, i notice what looks like a white star moving very slowly high up in the sky. since i just woke up, i attributed it to my tired eyes. however, the object seemed to almost pause and then continue moving very slowly. i then confirm the object to be moving slowly by comparing it's position to the stationary power lines. the object looked to be high in the sky (it looked like it was the same elevation of a star or satellite) but eventually moved into a position that resembled the elevation of a high aircraft. the object seemed to occasionally have a red color, but it was a prediminantly white, star-like object. 

the object then gradually moved in what i estimate to be a ne direction, all the while abruptly changing direction. i eventually lost sight of the object below some trees in the far off horizon. the event lasted roughly 10-15 minutes but i assume the object was in the sky before i stepped outside, at roughly 4:45 am. 

i had one other witness of the object. probably unrelated, but a few minutes after i lost sight of the object i noticed a green comet or meteor to my right, over the ocean. according to the other witness, those comets/meteors are common in the early morning here, so i don't think it was related to the object.

i was in san pedro, california.
content.summary: White star/satellite-like object high above stationary or moving slowly, and abruptly changing directions.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking care of my pets and they were looking to the sky . i looked too and i saw a kind of spacecraft with the size of a basket ball and it had a kind of landing gear on the back . the object was flying at a very high speed and  didn t make any sound it was at about 40 meters high . i think the object was metallic because reflected the sun light .
content.summary: I saw a kind of spacecraft with the size of a basket ball

content.detailedDescription: Watch a bright flashing red, blue, green light that stayed in place for 2 hours still watching.  smaller lights seem to be hovering down to building height then going back up towards bigger light.  all flashing.  between 8 - 10pm.  not a satellite or a star.  maybe chinese military but definitely like anything i have seen before
content.summary: One main flashing light and six small ones going to it

content.detailedDescription:
The craft did not look like any anything either my wife or i have ever seen from our location. object initially looked like it was more vertical structure like a human hanging from a jet wing but flying completely vertically in an upright position with level horizontal flight path and then changed to a disc like object.
i did start video on phone device. both my wife and self are heard asking 'what is it?' the video was poor quality as i was so flustered and knew it was passing so fast i was trying not to miss the event. i forgot to get foreground and reference points. the object was too small to find thru the camera so i only captured it on video 3 quick flashes.  i did shoot a couple pictures before it was out of sight 2 of which had images of the object. in the 2 pictures one was quite pixelated but the last is clearer and has a roof top vent as reference in the frame. 

1. my spouse and i were on our patio.
2. speed and odd appearance caught our attention. we are located near     dia, buckley afb and a smaller regional air field.  we are use to the busy air traffic and enjoy watching and identifying aircraft. we have never had a ufo sighting from this location or anything to catch our attention as out of the ordinary.
3. we had no idea what it was but it was the odd appearance and speed that caught our full attention. the object did not take off from any of the areas air fields and remained at the same altitude.  the flight path was not normal from our location compared to normal traffic patterns.The object remained at the altitude and speed from the beginning of the sighting.
4.The object didn't do anything remarkable other than appearance and velocity with complete silence and no exhaust.
5.We spent time after the event trying to figure out what we saw and settled on it was a ufo with unknown origin.
6. our sighting ended when the object disappeared behind our home. 

i am willing to share the video and pictures but was unable to upload here at this time.
content.summary: Appeared out of ne moving quickly, caught our attention and was horizon to horizon in less than 2 mins.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i had been driving back from a camping trip in the hoh rainforest near forks, wa and we pulled of at the kalaoch lodge pull out stop to use the bathroom and walk the dog. my wife started to walk away as i took some pics of the scenery as i usually do. the first 2 pics i got were like my thumb was in the way, but wasn't. than the 3rd shot was this string of lights, but i saw nothing in real view. i was shocked. do i snapped more pics but nothing. just 2 blury pics and the string of lights i am sending you. i felt nothing, dog wasn't barking, it was deathly quiet except the waves from the ocean. but please help explain the potential object or objects this is. it looks like the back of a cloaked star destroyer. i dont know but in comparison to the landscape, the thi g was huge!  i just used an iphone 6 w flash on. that's it. thank you for any help.
content.summary: 4 round lights w/ beam attached

content.detailedDescription: I was/ am at home, back yard in west kelowna, british columbia. i  initially spotted the first floationg object a week ago in the sky around 3:00 am. it was blinking a ray of diffrent colours, withe/blue, red and green. i thought it was a plane at first but it started doing unusual things like hovering, going in circular motions, zigzag patterns, and shooting across the sky to repeat it all over again.. i thought i was crazy, the next night around 1:00 am i seen the same object i woke my sister up to witness it. we ended up watching it for a hour and a half. the following night i seen two of them. i woke my mom up to see it and we watched them going around in circles and coming extremely close to the point we could make out a shape. ive been witnessing as well have been around others whom have witnessed the same odd phanomeonam for a 7 days straight. tonight is a full moon and they came out around 10:00 pm this evening, my father and mother watched them with me. we spotted 7 ufo's. a few still here others shot into the abyss. ive became obsessed with the sky after these insane events, i am watching two as i am writing this.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Fast lights (colours vary) that hover, move, go in circular motion, zigzag patterns,ascent&descent, hum noise, pulsates, fades,shoots across sky in same location everyday for the past week

content.detailedDescription: I was coming back from the gas station, and when i got back home i decided to just stand outside for a bit and look at the stars. recently, i notice that the more i pay attention to the sky and what's in it, the more things appear in the sky. this was the first time ever seen something so clear in my life. as i was looking up, a bright flash of blue green white light streaked through the sky for about 3 seconds and then vanished like it was never there. i began crying because in my mind i was asking myself, "is there anyone else out there or am i wasting my time." then, there it was! right where i was looking in the sky. i wanted to stay outside longer and see what else i could witness, but i was overcome by fear just from hearing about abductions and people and children being taken by strange lights.. so i decided to go inside. when i came back outside about 2 minutes later, i tried to look for something else. low and behold, i witnessed what looked like a star just making it's way across the sky. no bigger but no smaller than the stars surrounding it. i watched this for about 1 minute and then the feeling of fear, or being watched, took hold of me again. i began crying again but it wasn't tears from only fear, but also happiness in the fact that, wow.. there is no way that anything from this planet/dimension.
content.summary: I was stargazing and then witnessed a short streak of light with something leading it.

content.detailedDescription:
Just to let you know my background, i have a past that includes aviation (private pilot single engine land & sea, licensed faa aircraft mechanic, former faa air traffic controller tower trainee, did some aviation accident investigation for a worldwide insurer airclaims in hawaii and alaska, and have a bachelors degree in aviation administration from embry riddle aeronautical university-which included a course in flight physiology) and have been an avid amateur astronomer since childhood (having built and owned various telescopes, and taken several formal college level courses in the subject-including astro-photography).  

i have most recently worked the last 23 years as an acute inpatient psychiatric rn at a major hospital in honolulu after getting my nursing degree.  i have also completed some graduate level education in nursing.

i believe that i am somewhat familiar with aerial/astronomy objects and have been able to be clinical/objective in my appraisal of anything unusual that i might have seen, but this episode was different and unexplained.

on 7-29-15 at approximately 2020 i was walking towards my apartment on the 16th floor of my high rise condo and noted that the sky was partly cloud with cumulus clouds, the almost full moon was out, and a few stars visible. i then noted with my peripheral vision another bright object in the northern sky at about 70 degrees elevation. i assumed it was jupiter, being a yellow-white in color and bright, but this object being actually somewhere between jupiter and venus in magnitude.  then i realized that jupiter/venus had been in conjunction in the western sky lately and could not be the object. i am also familiar with the appearance of stars and other planets.

this was different, in that the object appeared as a steady light/orb and to my surprise was moving in a mostly linear/ballistic northerly direction with relation to the building overhang.  i cannot rule out that there might have been some slight wobble, but being familiar with autokinesis, i could not rule out this as the cause. i looked to see if the object had any lesser peripheral lighting such as aircraft position or anti-collision lights, but none were apparent. i thought it strange that if this was the landing light of an airplane that it is usually not visible at that angle when moving away. i could not tell the altitude of the object but it seemed as high as an aircraft might traverse or maybe even higher.  strangely no noise was noted, which would be usually heard from an aircraft/airliner.  it was visible while moving for perhaps 20 seconds before disappearing behind a cloud and not re-emerging on either side.  

i also gave thought to maybe it was a weather balloon being illuminated at high altitude where the sun was still striking it since it was only 2020 and the sun sets later in summer, so i cannot rule this out. i do not know what the prevailing high altitude winds were at the time.  however, i do recall such objects and even satellites that i have seen in the past and they tend to oscillate in brightness as they move due to their changing irregular surfaces.

this is the first time that i have experienced something like this and believe that if others in the east oahu area of hawaii kai (city & county of honolulu) were looking in the same direction at the same time, they would have easily seen it.  i plan on calling the honolulu advertiser local newspaper in the am to see if others reported this.
content.summary: Saw unknown yellow-whitish object move north in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to smoke a cigarette and i saw a beautiful sunset,i like to watch sunset and sometimes take pictures with my cell phone. i took a few pictures first and some kind of sparkle or twinkle caught my eye and i was seeing what look like a transparent balloon in the driveway of my next door neighbor but it seem to be glowing a little and i wasn't sure what it was so i stared at it. i looked around to see if someone else on my street might be seeing it i kept looking at it and it rose a little higher than the car i was looking over at it and i was more mesmerised than anything else and i kept having to tell myself take a picture take a picture take a picture and it hovered about head high for a while and made a air hissing sound. it was football shaped actually but you could still see through it, it had kind of a pinkish aura around it.I kept wondering if it was a balloon or a ufo,i kept finding myself not taking pictures and just watching it and kept having to say take a picture and it eventually started to rise up and as it was rising in kind of a straight line heading towards sun which was showing through the clouds i tried to move a little closer and i dropped my phone and by the time i picked up my phone it was gone.Only the hissing sound could be heard and then it faded away and i just stood there kind of mesmerized wondering if i saw what i thought i saw, i finally sat down at home for about an hourand i decided i should report this so i started looking for someone to report it to not feeling anything just wishing i got more pictures of it or wish i had a movie camera but you get what you can get i just wanted to report it. thank you. i do have the pictures. the 1st pic shows nothing. the 2nd shows the light through my neighbors tinted car window. the 3rd shows the object above the roof.The 4th shows it rising away.
content.summary: Looking at sunsets and started two take cell phone pictures then i saw a light kept taking pictures when i tried to get closer i dropped the phone, by the time i picked it up the object was gone.

content.detailedDescription: I was at the park with my stepdad & neighbors when my stepdad notice a object in the sky. it looked like a fireball to me until it broke into more objects that hovered & moved independent of one another and they didn't continue to free fall like the original object. curious to what it could be and surprised that it was happening right in front of me. my reaction after the fact was that that's the type of event you only hear about or see on tv. i loss sight of it because it disappeared.
content.summary: A ufo was observed by several people & cell phone cameras recorded the event

content.detailedDescription:
An event held on may 25 at the santa margarita featured a b-25 mitchell bomber, which offered rides to the public from the private strip on the ranch.

while working in my front yard i saw the b-25 flying just above the oak trees heading north before making a turn towars the south and proceeding on to the runway for landing.
as the plane passed me i took my samsung galaxy phone and began taking a few pictures.

as i did i saw something streak past the plane heading west as the plane headed north. i quickly lost sight of the object as my attention was focused on the plane.

when i looked at my pictures i saw that the object was captured in one of the photos.

i can not identify the object and i am forwarding this report to you for your files.
content.summary: Ufo buzzed a vintage b-25 mitchell bomber as it approached for landing.

content.detailedDescription: We were driving northbound going back to cairo between the mountains and suddenly  three of us see a naked musilli being walking along the empty streets that did not look like a human being,  i stopped but the others were screaming to move on fast, and then we look to the sky on the west and we see that triangular shaped object flying above with some red flashing lights we kind of chased it for the next 15 minutes and then suddenly disappeared
content.summary: Ufo sighting in south sinai egypt

content.detailedDescription: Shy of a full moon tonight but a bright beautiful night.  i was observing a plane flying over in east fishkill location of ny.  around 10:30 p.M.  i stood on the back deck and looked up at the few stars.  i noticed an faint round/oval dull object in the far east sky moving from south to north facing east.  as it moved, i seen it disappear.  i thought, ok, maybe a drone but it was so high up in the sky.  i moved towards my porch to look up to the stars again; at 10:40 p.M. i noticed the same dull starlike round/oval object on the other side moving in a northernly direction. it hovered then moved again.  it eventually disappeared upon my observation.  i've noticed these occasionally but like my aunt in puerto rico says; it's just one of those wondrous things that is part of our universe.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Starlike dull oval object to far to see details.  observed twice after military planes flew over.

content.detailedDescription: I was observing the night sky in my backyard between 2 am and 3 am on july 28. i was watching satellites go by and i saw a few shooting stars. i had no binoculars and no telescope. i was facing west. all the satellites i saw were at a high elevation but suddenly i noticed a yellow-orange light brighter and bigger than any star in the sky. i was sitting in a chair. it was at a low elevation because i saw it lower than the power line and higher than the telephone line in the pole in my back yard. so i estimate the elevation to be around 20 degrees at most. the speed was similar to the speed of a satellite. the elevation stayed the same all the time because i always saw it between the two wires. the trajectory was a strait line. it didn't make any sound. i stopped looking at it when it was too far away behind me. at the time of the sighting i thought the trajectory, elevation and brightness to be unusual for a satellite. i thought it coud not be a plane as the light was a single light and not blinking and there was no sound and by the size of the object, if it was a plane, it would have been near enough for me to hear it. it was a very warm night with no wind, no clouds. this sighting happened in the city in a suburb.
content.summary: Bright yellow-orange light low in the sky with a strait path

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my back yard with my wife and her mother
the object rose straight up, entering my field of view and notice 'mid sky' -- not from below unobstructed sight lines.
hovered near perfectly still for several minutes, as my wife rushed inside to grab our good camera.  my mother in law and i watched it hover for several minutes.
made small 45 degree movements, then moved quickly down out of view -- dissappearing in clouds

i've watched aircraft at night, this did not behave or look like an aircraft, especially with how it hovered.

i took the photo as it was in its descent before disappearing in what appeared to be the clouds, as my wife rushed back out of the house with the camera.
it was moving down and away from us at the time i took the pic, yet its red light(s) were on the right side -- aircraft have red nav lights on the left, and i am positive it was not moving towards us.

also, there were no blinking white aircraft lights.  just solid white, and solid red.

not an aircraft.
content.summary: Not an aircraft

content.detailedDescription: Me and my girlfriend was walking home from my mother's .We get to the entrance of the apartments and i looked up and seen a huge black triangle up high in the sky. it wasn't completely dark out but the sun done set by that time, some neighbors in the neighborhood saw it too and we're lost for words about what we saw. i wanted my girlfriend to record it but my mother was calling and by the time she was done talking it had went up higher to the point you couldn't see it anymore. it had no lights, no sound traveling slow but acceleratin higher it went. it looked like a paraglider but way to big like as a jumbo jet big! i keep watching for about 30 minutes after it was gone but never seen anything.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It was a black obscure triangle that was bigger than a bus

content.detailedDescription: We were on our honeymoon and about 3 days into our week trip in lahaina. it was a crystal clear night and just like the previous nights we sat on the 13 floor balcony star gazing. we had seen satellites small aircraft, helicopters the previous nights. we both saw a small bright satellite moving across the sky fairly fast. as we watched it turned and headed straight for us. it changed shape to a very large and bright light like a spotlight. the light at one point shined right in our eyes. it then shot off in reverse at about a 45 degree angle and disappeared. no sound whatsoever. neither of us drink or do any drugs. we still can't explain what we saw.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Maui ufo

content.detailedDescription: I was filming a beautiful hail storm during sunset as the sun fell below cloud layer. i hadnt noticed the object while filming. iupon review of the footage i noticed something directly in the center of the sun. as i zoomed in i noticed these hovering spinning cylinders with spheres around them . the object/s disappear then re appear.  the film as well as pictures need to be zoomed in to really appreciate them.
content.summary: Verticle tubes with spheres orbiting around them

content.detailedDescription: In the early morning i was able to observe an object which had a glowing light was flying with a low speed over the hague and was clearly observable amongst the stars. with 20 years of experience observing the sky, and having seen objects like this before, i had to report this observation. the most amazing thing about the observation was that the lions giving orb actually suddenly disappeared without any logical reason. the sky was without clouds and filled with stars so there was no logical reason for me not to be able to observe its trajectory. after long evaluation i chose the report this phenomenon. it is surely not the most spectacular observation above the netherlands but clearly is significant one.
content.summary: Clear sky and no airplanes in the sky..  i saw an orb of light which did not blink and eventually  disappeared as if it was never there.
